description.value:
Granted Powers: You are a true lord of reptiles, and your gaze can drive weak creatures into unconsciousness.

Domain Spells:

  • 1st—@Compendium[pf1.spells.cfzk3vkv1c7ncaug]{Magic Fang}
  • 2nd—@Compendium[pf1.spells.05m8kfc2u9cg528g]{Animal Trance}
  • 3rd—@Compendium[pf1.spells.bgtmki0xl4xl4y91]{Magic Fang, Greater}
  • 4th—@Compendium[pf1.spells.vdh0yuzpjwhky6kr]{Poison}
  • 5th—@Compendium[pf1.spells.29cfi65seiajh5qv]{Animal Growth}
  • 6th—@Compendium[pf1.spells.z8xnkfpufuqapseq]{Eyebite}
  • 7th—@Compendium[pf1.spells.f828mjoo5afszqnk]{Creeping Doom} (takes the form of Diminutive-sized reptiles),
  • 8th—@Compendium[pf1.spells.3ah9mmg0odateh8l]{Animal Shapes}
  • 9th—@Compendium[pf1.spells.n3lp01euzcdmtbw5]{Shapechange}*Only reptiles.
